Articles.Content: when I see these massive, extremely high part count space ship it gets me thinking. when I build something over 100 parts it gets very laggy, but I have a pretty beefy computer and all the mods I have (7) are pretty low part count mods, or no part mods like hyperedit or Docking indicator. I want to know if it's possible to get my part count up by changing something in the settings from default, or if I have to shed some mods, or whatever. Just looking for a little feedback. Thanks!
